text: Sphingomonas melonis is a bacterium from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from the plant Cucumis melo var. inodorus in Madrid in Spain.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen Sphingomonas melonis can cause brown spots on melon fruits from the melon plant (Cucumis melo var. inodorus). == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas melonis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase melonis Category:Bacteria described in 2002
title: Sphingomonas melonis
